summary: I OWN A 2001 SATURN L300.  WITHIN THE LAST MONTH THE LIGHTING SYSTEM HAS BEGUN TO FLICKER DURING DRIVING.  WHILE I AM STOPPED IT GETS WORSE.  I HAVE BEEN IN CONTACT WITH THE DEALERSHIP AND THEY ASSURE ME THAT THIS IS NORMAL OPERATION FOR THE CAR AND THAT THEY ARE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM, BUT THEY HAVE NO IDEA ON HOW TO FIX IT.  I HAVE GOTTEN NOWHERE WITH THIS AND AM SURE THAT THIS CAN'T BE NORMAL. *JB
